All the tables in the database.

class Manager(BaseUserManager)¶

The admin accounts table.

Parameters:

BaseUserManager – From Django.

create_user(self, sid, password=None)¶

The function for creating a user.

Parameters:

  • sid – The user ID.

  • password – The password for the user. Defaults to None.

Raises:

ValueError – Raised if an ID isn’t entered for the user.

create_superuser(self, STAFF_ID, password)¶

The function for creating a superuser.

Parameters:

  • STAFF_ID – The superuser ID.

  • password – The password for the user.

class MenuCategory(models.Model)¶

The table for the menu categories.

Parameters:

models.Model – From Django.

__str__(self)¶

Returns the name of the category.

clean(self)¶

Ensure that the name is unique.

Raises:

ValidationError – Raised if a name is duplicated, or at least attempted.

validate_image_size(image)¶

Validates that the uploaded image is no larger than 5MB and is a supported format.

Parameters:

image – The image to be validated.

Raises:

ValidationError – Raised if the image is too big or in an unsupported format.

clean(self)¶

Ensure that the category exists and validates the image size.

Raises:
